price: Gabroonni Rahmaan isaan suutaan Dachii irra deemani; yeroo wallaaltonni isaan dubbisanis “Salaama” (nagaa) jedhanuudha.
arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waʿibādu al-raḥmāni alladhīna yamshūna ʿalā al-arḍi hawnan wa-idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāman
